bibl.title: Papyrus BM EA 10075 and Papyrus Bodleian MS. Egypt. A. 41 (P): Two Halves of a Ptolemaic Contract of Sale Reunited. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. EA 10075 [ed.: E.A.E. JELINKOVÁ, Sale of Inherited Property in the First Century B.C. (P. Brit. Mus. 10075, ex Salt Coll. No. 418), JEA 43 (1957) pp. 45-55 et pl. V]. - Sale of a property located within the Anubieion in the Memphite necropolis (with a Greek subscription), 64 B.C.
bibl.seg: 141.12 / 141.4 P. Bodl. Ms.Egypt. a. 41 (P) + P. Lond. Inv. EA 10075
